hard: Keira – deals a lot of aoe damage including Elmir’s clones so they won’t survive for too long.
ODH – Orion, Dorian, Helios combo works great against Elmir because of hard aoe damage.
Strong tanks like Ziri – Elmir attacks the enemy’s frontline only so having a good tank is a must.
soft: Armor artifact – Elmir is a physical damage dealer. Use armor artifacts to deny damage to him.
